item.title: A Night of Strikes and Smiles
item.description: Last week, we had the pleasure of spending an evening full of fun and friendly competition with the Winek Lab at a local bowling alley. It was a fantastic opportunity to connect with colleagues outside the lab and foster collaboration. We truly appreciate the time spent together and look forward to future social events and collaborations!

item.title: Hello, world!
item.description: The Dönertaş Group will come to life in January 2023 at the Leibniz Institute on Aging - Fritz Lipmann Institute (FLI)!
